title: Intelligent File Management
md: Automate repetitive and time-consuming file management tasks, from backups to metadata to archiving.

title: Efficient System Maintenance
md: Reduce the never-ending pinchlist of vital but tedious and time-consuming tasks.

title: Automated Identity and Access Management
md: A wide range of preset identity management workflows and an extensive library of off-the-shelf actions that can be used to quickly build custom identity and access solutions.

title: Data Analysis, Insights and Reporting
md: Find data, analyze that data and then produce reports and presentations for external compliance or internal performance monitoring.

title: Workflow Automation
md: Combine multiple actions and steps into a single streamlined workflow that uses automation and human inputs to improve a business process.

title: Data Formatting and Conversion
md: Extract file contents for pre-processing, virus detection, format conversion, etc.
